title: Can't use MariaDB Database
author: phillipunzen
body_snippet: I have created a new database on my MariaDB Server and the mRemoteNG can't connect with this database. Have anyone a idea why? Thank you all!

comments.snippet: Above window is for Microsoft SQL Server database, it will not work on MariaDB, that is completely different database.
comments.author: igor2x

comments.snippet: Its not yet properly tested, but perhaps will be included to testing phase
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.78.*
